== Detailhes bibliográficos de {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Nome de la páigina: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Outor: Cuntrebuidores de la {{SITENAME}} * Publicado: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Data de la redadeira rebison: {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}, a las {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Data de cunsulta: {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}, a las {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Lhigaçon permaniente: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * Eidenteficador de la berson de la páigina: {{REVISIONID}}
== Stilos de citaçon de {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[:en:APA style|Stilo de la Associaçon Amaricana de Psicologie]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Cunsultado a las {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}} an {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[:en:MLA Style Manual|Stilo de la Associaçon de la Lhenguaige Moderna]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[:en:MHRA Style Guide|Stilo de la Associaçon de Ambestigaçon de las Houmanidades Modernas]] === Cuntrebuidores de la {{SITENAME}}, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [cunsultado an {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[:en:The Chicago Manual of Style|Stilo de l Lhibro de Stilo de Chicago]] === Cuntrebuidores de la {{SITENAME}}, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (cunsultado an {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[:en:Council of Science Editors|Stilo de l Cunseilho de Eiditores de Ciéncia/Biologie]] === Cuntrebuidores de la {{SITENAME}}. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Anternete]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [citado an {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}]. Çponible an: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[:en:Bluebook|Stilo Bluebook]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (redadeira besita an {{CURRENTDAY}} de {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} de {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Antrada [[BibTeX]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[An lhinha; cunsultado an {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Al outelizar l cunjunto de lhigaçon de l [[LaTeX]] (\usepackage{url} an algua parte de l preámbulo) que tende a fornecer lhigaçones de Anternete mais bien formatados, l seguinte puode ser preferido: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[An lhinha; cunsultado an {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
